actions.text: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Lee (NV).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 116-6 to specify that all Vet Centers, not just Vet Centers located within a physical area in which VA has jurisdiction, would also be a place where veterans could be eligible for no-cost child care.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 116-6 to specify that all Vet Centers, not just Vet Centers located within a physical area in which VA has jurisdiction, would also be a place where veterans could be eligible for no-cost child care.
